bug.author: nsubiron
bug.summary: OpenGL warnings when running in debug
bug.description:
The following warning are printed regularly (every frame?) to the console <denchmark-code>[2019.01.27-11.14.13:918][962]LogRHI: Warning: [API][UndefinedBehavior][Medium][131222] Program undefined behavior warning: Sampler object 20 has depth compare enabled. It is being used with non-depth texture SSProfiles, by a program that samples it with a regular sampler. This is undefined behavior. [2019.01.27-11.14.13:993][962]LogRHI: Warning: [API][Performance][Medium][131186] Buffer performance warning: Buffer object 36503 (bound to GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER_ARB, usage hint is GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW) is being copied/moved from VIDEO memory to DMA CACHED memory. </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h4>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Package the project in Debug config (Change -clientconfig=Debug in Package.sh) Run the simulator
